task: Deploy founding member fix and searched artist highlight
message: Fixed timing bug where Wikipedia supplement data arrived after graph was built. Added cyan highlight for searched artist. Ready for production deployment.

key_files: src/components/graph/artist-graph.tsx - cyan highlight for searched artist
changes_summary: Fix: Founding member status now applies when supplement data arrives after graph build
Fix: Sidebar F badge now shows for Wikipedia-derived founding members
Enhancement: Searched artist has cyan ring/glow in graph
